column3: A location is a position, site, or area where something is located
column7: Location may be geographic, physical, or virtual.
column12: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Georg P Krog

column3: A political entity indicative of a sovereign or non-sovereign territorial state comprising of distinct geographical areas
column7: The definition of country is not intended for political interpretation. DPVCG welcomes alternate definitions based in existing sources with global scope, such as UN or ISO.
column12: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Georg P Krog

column3: A political union of two or more countries with an establishment of common authority
A political union of two or more countries based on economic or trade agreements
A region is an area or site that is considered a location
A law is a set of rules created by government or authorities
Represents a country outside applicable or compatible jurisdiction as outlined in law
